about_the_game:
HENTAI 18+ - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!
The plot of it is simple - you have to find pair cards on the level. After that you will see a stunning image of the nicest game girls. Besides, such games help you to develop your view memory. Do the levels, listen to good music, enjoy the images but the most important is getting pleasure!


KEY FEATURES:

- Simple and clear gameplay.
- Relaxing soundtrack.
- Nice pictures.
- An unforgettable experience.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is for adults. The game shows scenes of a sexual nature and nudity. All characters are fictional and older 18 years.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 500MB
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
